snippet: The police in southern India arrested 11 employees of a fireworks factory on Thursday, a day after a fire at the plant in Sivakasi killed 40 workers and injured 60 others.
lead_paragraph: The police in southern India arrested 11 employees of a fireworks factory on Thursday, a day after a fire at the plant in Sivakasi killed 40 workers and injured 60 others.

headline.main: India: 11 Workers Arrest After Factory Fire
headline.print_headline: India: 11 Workers Arrest After Factory Fire
